title: the only purpose of honor is to remind you how close you are to a ban, nothing more
body:
the capsules don't matter. summoner icons are meaningless. ward skins are worthless. if your champ pool is too wide for the BE from leveling (over 20k) to get you into ranked on a fresh account, you're either an MVP-worthy professional mid laner, or you don't care about climbing 

if you don't care about climbing, why play this game?
